short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon should be about the buyer and give him organic results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Minimum value product that makes amazon a bit more usable again.

Note: This extension does not make pages faster, these items are still loaded - but hidden.

Search results:
- removes sponsored elements
- removes the "Shop by brand" widget
- but does keep the section inspired by the last pages you visited
- removes the badges and other nonsense (coupons and other call to action like "only 1 item left in stock"...)

Product pages:
- removes the "Customers who viewed this..." widgets
- removes the "Sponsored products..." widgets
- removes the "share on social media" and "tell-a-friend" widgets
- useful things like questions and comments are still shown

Everywhere - hides the footer clutter:
- removes the "﻿﻿Sponsored products related to this search"
- removes the "Brands related to your search"

Currently supports:
- amazon.com, .de, .fr, .co.uk


Changelog

v0.11
- Added interface to activate/deactivate the extension
- Can choose whether the "compare to similar article" section is shown in the product page
- Some minor product page polishing

v0.1
- Initial version
